public static synchronized void initProperty() throws Exception {
    if (property == null) {
      Properties p1 = new Properties();
      System.out.println(
          ".."
              + File.separator
              + "commons"
              + File.separator
              + "src"
              + File.separator
              + "test"
              + File.separator
              + "resources"
              + File.separator
              + "framework.properties");
      p1.load(
          new FileInputStream(
              ".."
                  + File.separator
                  + "commons"
                  + File.separator
                  + "src"
                  + File.separator
                  + "test"
                  + File.separator
                  + "resources"
                  + File.separator
                  + "framework.properties"));
      setProperty(p1);
    }
  }
